title.rendered: Sony Music Group Suspends Operations in Russia

content.rendered: “Sony Music Group calls for peace in Ukraine and an end to the violence. We have suspended operations in Russia and will continue our support of global humanitarian relief efforts to aid victims in need.” – Sony Music Group

excerpt.rendered: “Sony Music Group calls for peace in Ukraine and an end to the violence. We have suspended operations in Russia and will continue our support of global humanitarian relief efforts to aid victims in need.” – Sony Music Group
